original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 311.70/312.20 against USD, bond yields steady at close
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at close on Monday and the rupee closed at 311.70/312.20 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 28.00/50 percent, steady from 28.10/25 percent at Friday’s close.
The rupee closed at 311.70/312.20 against the US dollar in the spot market steady from the last close at 313.10/40. (Colombo/May15/2023)
